item.title: Embeds Testing
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: YouTube testing: Embed sample snippets provided by YouTube directly Same as above but with privacy enhancements YouTube snippet copied from WordPress: Zero-emissions vessel design incorporating wind, hydrogen, solar etc. YouTube snippet copied from StackOverflow: Tweet sample snippet provided by Twitter directly: Farmland reverts to woodland. Nobody planted these trees or decided what spacing to put them at or mantained them as they grew. Given enough time, they sort that stuff out for themselves.
